titleEn: A free version of ChatGPT designed for teachers

title: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max 系统安全文档
description: 本系统安全文档阐述为 GPT-5.1-CodexMax 实施的全面安全措施，详细说明模型级防护（如针对恶意任务和提示注入的专项安全训练）与产品级防护（包括代理沙箱机制和可配置网络访问）。
titleZh: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max 系统安全文档
titleEn: GPT-5.1-Codex-Max system security document
descriptionZh: 本系统安全文档阐述为 GPT-5.1-CodexMax 实施的全面安全措施，详细说明模型级防护（如针对恶意任务和提示注入的专项安全训练）与产品级防护（包括代理沙箱机制和可配置网络访问）。
descriptionEn: This system security document describes the comprehensive security measures implemented for GPT-5.1-CodexMax, detailing model-level protection (such as dedicated security training for malicious tasks and prompt injection) and product-level protection (including proxy sandboxing mechanisms and configurable network access).

title: Gemini 3的意义：AI已超越“幻觉阶段”，接近人类水平，“人机协作”将从“人类纠正AI”转向“人类指导AI工作”
description: Ethan Mollick认为，Gemini 3的出现标志着具有自主行动能力的“代理模式”的崛起。
titleZh: Gemini 3的意义：AI已超越“幻觉阶段”，接近人类水平，“人机协作”将从“人类纠正AI”转向“人类指导AI工作”
titleEn: The Significance of Gemini 3: AI Has Surpassed the "Hallucination Stage," Approaching Human-Level Performance, and "Human-AI Collaboration" Will Shift from "Humans Correcting AI" to "Humans Guiding AI's Work"
descriptionZh: Ethan Mollick认为，Gemini 3的出现标志着具有自主行动能力的“代理模式”的崛起。
descriptionEn: Ethan Mollick believes that the emergence of Gemini 3 signifies the rise of "agent models" with autonomous action capabilities. While not flawless, the mistakes they make are no longer baseless "hallucinations" but are closer to human-like errors in judgment or intent understanding.
